title: Cant login to pvp.net
body:
hello well my problem is simple and cant really explain what's wrong just for me to say that when I try to log in to the pvp.net bar from the pbe accounts it wont let me log in the icon keeps turning but it never loads it doesnt matter if I put the right or wrong info it never lets me log in 
http://imgur.com/FxL8tCv

replies.body: Do you have a PBE account? I don't see that you have one based on the account you're posting from.  You'd have to have a PBE account in order to sign into the PBE boards, though anyone can view them.
